name: registrations_citations_list
description:
A paginated list of the registration's alternative citation styles

#### Returns
Returns a JSON object containing `data` and `links` keys.

The `data` key contains an array of up to 10 citation styles. Each resource in the array is a separate citation styles object.

The `links` key contains a dictionary of links that can be used for [pagination](#tag/Pagination).
#### Filtering
You can optionally request that the response only include citation styles that match your filters by utilizing the `filter` query parameter, e.g. https://api.osf.io/v2/registrations/wucr8/citations/?filter[title]=open.

Citation styles may be filtered by their `id`, `title`, `short-title`, and `summary`.

registration_id.description: The unique identifier of the registration.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the citation style entity.
**date_parsed**: The time at which the citation style was first parsed, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.
**short_title**: The short name for the citation style.
**summary**: The summary of the citation style.
**title**: The official name of the citation style.
**id**: The identifier of the citation style, e.g. APA.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the citation style entity.
**type**: The type identifier of the citation style entity (`citation-styles`).
